message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40% of the initial amount. You can either accept or propose a different split.
I'll give you 40% of the remaining amount, but I'll take 60% for myself. It's a good deal, don't you think?
I'll give you a bit more than my previous offer. Let's aim for a 42% split. It's a fair deal, don't you think?
